info.description: Trackstar is a Unified API that provides standard endpoints for Supply Chain Logistics. We currently offer an API for Warehouse Management Systems (WMS).
info.title: Trackstar API

parameters.name: x-trackstar-access-token
parameters.description: Your user's access token for a specific integration (ShipHero, Extensiv, etc).

post.description: Get the request body shape by calling the [meta](/wms-api/kits/meta) endpoint.

Creates a temporary link token that is required to initiate the `react-trackstar-link` component.
See the [Getting Started guide](/how-to-guides/getting-started) for more details.

parameters.name: x-trackstar-access-token
parameters.description: Your user's access token for a specific integration (ShipHero, Extensiv, etc).

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The page token to use to retrieve the next page of results. If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.

parameters.name: created_date
parameters.description: Use this parameter to retrieve items filtered to a specific date range. For example, to get all items between 2023-03-10 and 2023-03-22, you would send `created_date[gt]=2023-03-10T00:00:00Z&created_date[lt]=2023-03-22T00:00:00Z.` See the [filtering docs](/how-to-guides/about-the-api#Filtering) for more. The date format must always be YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. The default is 1000.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the order. See the [order information](info) for more details.

parameters.name: warehouse_customer_id
parameters.description: The ID of the customer associated with the resource

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel the order was placed on

parameters.name: order_number
parameters.description: A user-friendly identifier for the order

parameters.name: reference_id
parameters.description: An external unique identifier for the order

get.description: Returns all Orders for the WMS connection associated with the provided access token.

parameters.name: x-trackstar-access-token
parameters.description: Your user's access token for a specific integration (ShipHero, Extensiv, etc).

post.description: Get the request body shape by calling the [meta](/wms-api/orders/meta) endpoint.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: An optional access token to filter connections by. If included, a single connection associated with the access token will be returned.

get.description: Returns connected integrations for your organization.

parameters.name: x-trackstar-access-token
parameters.description: Your user's access token for a specific integration (ShipHero, Extensiv, etc).

delete.description: Deletes the connection associated with your access token.

For example, to get all items between 2023-03-10 and 2023-03-22, you would send `created_date[gt]=2023-03-10T00:00:00Z&created_date[lt]=2023-03-22T00:00:00Z.` See the [filtering docs](/how-to-guides/about-the-api#Filtering) for more. The date format must always be YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

Exchanges a temporary authorization code for a permanent access token.
See the [Getting Started guide](/how-to-guides/getting-started) for more details.

parameters.name: warehouse_customer_id
parameters.description: The ID of the customer associated with the resource

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user who performed the activity.

parameters.name: warehouse_id
parameters.description: The ID of the warehouse where the activity took place. Can be passed into the [Warehouse](/wms-api/warehouses/get-item) endpoint for more details.

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: The type of activity that was performed.

parameters.name: associated_object_type
parameters.description: The type of object that was associated with the activity.

parameters.name: associated_object_id
parameters.description: The ID of the object that was associated with the activity.

parameters.name: activity_start_time
parameters.description: Use this parameter to retrieve items filtered to a specific date range. For example, to get all items between 2023-03-10 and 2023-03-22, you would send `activity_start_time[gt]=2023-03-10T00:00:00Z&activity_start_time[lt]=2023-03-22T00:00:00Z.` See the [filtering docs](/how-to-guides/about-the-api#Filtering) for more. The date format must always be YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

get.description: Returns all Warehouse Customers for the WMS connection associated with the provided access token.

post.description:
Generates a sandbox with mocked out data.
Uses the same connection ID every time, and will reset any existing sandbox.
See the [walkthrough](/how-to-guides/sandbox) for more information.

parameters.name: x-trackstar-access-token
parameters.description: Your user's access token for a specific integration (ShipHero, Extensiv, etc).

get.description: Returns a single Warehouse Customer for the WMS connection with the associated warehouse customer id.

id.description: The ID of the item that wasn't found.

field1.description: Placeholder - variable based on integration. Read about the [meta endpoint](/how-to-guides/programmatic-writes) for more information.

field2.description: Placeholder - variable based on integration. Read about the [meta endpoint](/how-to-guides/programmatic-writes) for more information.

inventory_item_id.description: ID of the inventory item. Can be passed into the [Inventory](/wms-api/inventory/get-item) endpoint for more details.

unit_quantity.description: The number of units of the inventory item in the product.

id.description: The unique ID of the product.

warehouse_customer_id.description: The ID of the merchant/tenant/customer that owns the product. Can be passed into the [Warehouse Customer](/wms-api/warehouse-customers/get-item) endpoint for more details.

created_date.description: The date the product was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

updated_date.description: The date the product was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

gtin.description: The Global Trade Item Number of the product. i.e. UPC, EAN, or ISBN.

inventory_items.description: A list of inventory items associated with the product.

link_token.description: The link token that is required to initiate the `react-trackstar-link` component.

product_id.description: Can be passed into the [Product](/wms-api/products/get-item) endpoint for more details.

unit_price.description: The price of the product in the currency specified by `invoice_currency_code`.

inventory_item_id.description: The ID of the inventory item. Can be passed into the [Inventory](/wms-api/inventory/get-item) endpoint for more details.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the size of the package.

weight_unit.description: The unit of measurement for the weight of the package.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the size of the box.

weight_unit.description: The unit of measurement for the weight of the box.

inventory_item_id.description: The ID of the inventory item. Can be passed into the [Inventory](/wms-api/inventory/get-item) endpoint for more details.

lot_id.description: The ID of the lot the inventory item was picked from.

expiration_date.description: The expiration date of the lot the inventory item was picked from. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

line_items.description: A list of the inventory items included in the box.

tracking_number.description: The tracking number for the package.

tracking_url.description: The URL for the tracking number.

carrier.description: The carrier used to ship the package.

scac.description: The Standard Carrier Alpha Code for the carrier used to ship the package.

shipping_cost.description: The cost incurred by the warehouse to ship the package.

boxes.description: A list of the boxes included in the package (AKA cartons).

warehouse_id.description: The warehouse this order was shipped from. Can be passed into the [Warehouse](/wms-api/warehouses/get-item) endpoint for more details.

shipped_date.description: The date the shipment was sent. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

line_items.description: List of the inventory items listed in the shipment.

packages.description: A list of the packages included in the shipment.

id.description: The unique ID of the order.

warehouse_customer_id.description: The ID of the merchant/tenant/customer that owns the order. Can be passed into the [Warehouse Customer](/wms-api/warehouse-customers/get-item) endpoint for more details.

created_date.description: The date the order was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

updated_date.description: The date the order was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

reference_id.description: An external unique identifier for the order, such as a Shopify order id. Defaults to `id` if client has not defined one.

order_number.description: A user-friendly identifier for their order. Defaults to `reference_id` if not provided.

status.description: The status of the order. See the [order information](info) for more details.

raw_status.description: The raw status (if available) returned directly from the WMS.

channel.description: The channel the order was placed through, such as Shopify or wholesale.

trading_partner.description: For retail/EDI orders, the trading partner who placed the order (e.g. Target, Walmart).

shipping_method.description: The method by which the warehouse will ship the order to the customer. Can be passed into the [Shipping Method](/wms-api/shipping-methods/get-item) endpoint for more details.

invoice_currency_code.description: The currency used for this order. If not provided explicitly, defaults to USD.

total_price.description: The total price a customer paid for the order.

total_tax.description: The total tax on the order.

total_discount.description: The total amount discounted from the order.

total_shipping.description: The total shipping cost for the order incurred by the customer.

line_items.description: List of the products included in the order.

shipments.description: List of the shipments sent out to the customer.

product_id.description: Can be passed into the [Product](/wms-api/products/get-item) endpoint for more details.

unit_price.description: The price of the product in the currency specified by `invoice_currency_code`.

inventory_item_id.description: The ID of the inventory item. Can be passed into the [Inventory](/wms-api/inventory/get-item) endpoint for more details.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the size of the package.

weight_unit.description: The unit of measurement for the weight of the package.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the size of the box.

weight_unit.description: The unit of measurement for the weight of the box.

inventory_item_id.description: The ID of the inventory item. Can be passed into the [Inventory](/wms-api/inventory/get-item) endpoint for more details.

lot_id.description: The ID of the lot the inventory item was picked from.

expiration_date.description: The expiration date of the lot the inventory item was picked from. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

line_items.description: A list of the inventory items included in the box.

tracking_number.description: The tracking number for the package.

tracking_url.description: The URL for the tracking number.

carrier.description: The carrier used to ship the package.

scac.description: The Standard Carrier Alpha Code for the carrier used to ship the package.

shipping_cost.description: The cost incurred by the warehouse to ship the package.

boxes.description: A list of the boxes included in the package (AKA cartons).

warehouse_id.description: The warehouse this order was shipped from. Can be passed into the [Warehouse](/wms-api/warehouses/get-item) endpoint for more details.

shipped_date.description: The date the shipment was sent. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

line_items.description: List of the inventory items listed in the shipment.

packages.description: A list of the packages included in the shipment.

id.description: The unique ID of the order.

warehouse_customer_id.description: The ID of the merchant/tenant/customer that owns the order. Can be passed into the [Warehouse Customer](/wms-api/warehouse-customers/get-item) endpoint for more details.

created_date.description: The date the order was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

updated_date.description: The date the order was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

reference_id.description: An external unique identifier for the order, such as a Shopify order id. Defaults to `id` if client has not defined one.

order_number.description: A user-friendly identifier for their order. Defaults to `reference_id` if not provided.

status.description: The status of the order. See the [order information](info) for more details.

raw_status.description: The raw status (if available) returned directly from the WMS.

channel.description: The channel the order was placed through, such as Shopify or wholesale.

trading_partner.description: For retail/EDI orders, the trading partner who placed the order (e.g. Target, Walmart).

shipping_method.description: The method by which the warehouse will ship the order to the customer. Can be passed into the [Shipping Method](/wms-api/shipping-methods/get-item) endpoint for more details.

invoice_currency_code.description: The currency used for this order. If not provided explicitly, defaults to USD.

total_price.description: The total price a customer paid for the order.

total_tax.description: The total tax on the order.

total_discount.description: The total amount discounted from the order.

total_shipping.description: The total shipping cost for the order incurred by the customer.

line_items.description: List of the products included in the order.

shipments.description: List of the shipments sent out to the customer.

affected_endpoints.description: A list of endpoints that were affected by the error.

first_seen.description: The date the error was first seen. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

last_seen.description: The date the error was last seen. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

connection_id.description: The unique ID of the connection.

integration_name.description: The name of the integration associated with the connection.

created_at.description: The date the connection was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

last_used.description: The date the connection was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

times_used.description: The number of times the connection has been used in a request to the Trackstar API. Equal to the number of API calls made with this connection.

latest_sync.description: The data this connection last synced (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

errors.description: A list of errors for the connection. e.g. missing permissions, invalid credentials, etc.

data.description: A list of connections for your organization.

onhand.description: The total amount of inventory in the lot.

expiration_date.description: The date that the lot expires. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

warehouse_id.description: ID of the warehouse that the lot is kept in. Can be passed into the [Warehouse](/wms-api/warehouses/get-item) endpoint for more details.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the size of the inventory item.

weight_unit.description: The unit of measurement for the weight of the inventory item.

id.description: The unique ID of the inventory item.

warehouse_customer_id.description: The ID of the merchant/tenant/customer that owns the inventory item. Can be passed into the [Warehouse Customer](/wms-api/warehouse-customers/get-item) endpoint for more details.

updated_date.description: The date the inventory item was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

active.description: Whether the inventory item is active.

awaiting.description: Inventory that the warehouse is awaiting delivery of.

onhand.description: The total amount of inventory in the warehouse.

committed.description: Inventory that is already assigned to orders.

unfulfillable.description: Inventory that can't be fulfilled for orders (e.g. damaged/quarantined).

fulfillable.description: Inventory that can be fulfilled for orders.

unsellable.description: Inventory that is being held from sales channels (e.g. reserved).

sellable.description: Inventory that is available in sales channels.

substitute_skus.description: A list of inventory item SKUs that can replace this item if it runs out of stock.

lots.description: A lot is a specific batch of inventory items that are stored together and expire together. If an item doesn't expire, it is not allocated to a lot.

updated_date.description: The date the product was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

gtin.description: The Global Trade Item Number of the product. i.e. UPC, EAN, or ISBN.

inventory_items.description: A list of inventory items associated with the product.

inventory_item_id.description: ID of the inventory item. Can be passed into the [Inventory](/wms-api/inventory/get-item) endpoint for more details.

unit_quantity.description: The number of units of the inventory item in the product.

id.description: The unique ID of the product.

warehouse_customer_id.description: The ID of the merchant/tenant/customer that owns the product. Can be passed into the [Warehouse Customer](/wms-api/warehouse-customers/get-item) endpoint for more details.

created_date.description: The date the product was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

updated_date.description: The date the product was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

gtin.description: The Global Trade Item Number of the product. i.e. UPC, EAN, or ISBN.

inventory_items.description: A list of inventory items associated with the product.

onhand.description: The total amount of inventory in the lot.

expiration_date.description: The date that the lot expires. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

warehouse_id.description: ID of the warehouse that the lot is kept in. Can be passed into the [Warehouse](/wms-api/warehouses/get-item) endpoint for more details.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the size of the inventory item.

weight_unit.description: The unit of measurement for the weight of the inventory item.

id.description: The unique ID of the inventory item.

warehouse_customer_id.description: The ID of the merchant/tenant/customer that owns the inventory item. Can be passed into the [Warehouse Customer](/wms-api/warehouse-customers/get-item) endpoint for more details.

created_date.description: The date the inventory item was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

updated_date.description: The date the inventory item was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

active.description: Whether the inventory item is active.

awaiting.description: Inventory that the warehouse is awaiting delivery of.

onhand.description: The total amount of inventory in the warehouse.

committed.description: Inventory that is already assigned to orders.

unfulfillable.description: Inventory that can't be fulfilled for orders (e.g. damaged/quarantined).

fulfillable.description: Inventory that can be fulfilled for orders.

unsellable.description: Inventory that is being held from sales channels (e.g. reserved).

sellable.description: Inventory that is available in sales channels.

substitute_skus.description: A list of inventory item SKUs that can replace this item if it runs out of stock.

lots.description: A lot is a specific batch of inventory items that are stored together and expire together. If an item doesn't expire, it is not allocated to a lot.

id.description: The unique ID of the warehouse.

created_date.description: The date the warehouse was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

updated_date.description: The date the warehouse was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

id.description: The ID of the labor activity.

created_date.description: The date the labor activity was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

updated_date.description: The date the labor activity was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

user_id.description: The ID of the user who performed the activity.

user_first_name.description: The first name of the user who performed the activity.

user_last_name.description: The last name of the user who performed the activity.

warehouse_id.description: The ID of the warehouse where the activity took place. Can be passed into the [Warehouse](/wms-api/warehouses/get-item) endpoint for more details.

activity_type.description: The type of activity that was performed.

activity_start_time.description: The time when the activity started. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

activity_end_time.description: The time when the activity ended. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

associated_object_type.description: The type of object that was associated with the activity.

associated_object_id.description: The ID of the object that was associated with the activity.

quantity.description: The number of items that were associated with the activity.

id.description: The unique ID of the shipping method.

created_date.description: The date the shipping method was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

updated_date.description: The date the shipping method was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

name.description: The name of the shipping method.

description.description: Additional information provided about the shipping method.

inventory_item_id.description: Can be passed into the [Inventory](/wms-api/inventory/get-item) endpoint for more details.

expected_quantity.description: Total quantity of the item expected to be received.

received_quantity.description: Total quantity of the item that has been received.

inventory_item_id.description: Can be passed into the [Inventory](/wms-api/inventory/get-item) endpoint for more details.

quantity.description: Total quantity of the item that has been received.

id.description: The unique ID of the receiving event.

line_items.description: List of line items included in the receiving event.

id.description: The unique ID of the inbound shipment.

warehouse_customer_id.description: The ID of the merchant/tenant/customer that owns the inbound shipment. Can be passed into the [Warehouse Customer](/wms-api/warehouse-customers/get-item) endpoint for more details.

created_date.description: The date the inbound shipment was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

updated_date.description: The date the inbound shipment was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

purchase_order_number.description: The number of the purchase order associated with the inbound shipment.

status.description: The status of the inbound shipment. See the [inbound shipment information](info) for more details.

raw_status.description: The raw status (if available) returned directly from the WMS.

supplier.description: The supplier from which the shipment is being sent.

expected_arrival_date.description: Date the shipment is expected to reach the warehouse. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

warehouse_id.description: ID of the warehouse that will be receiving the shipment. Can be passed into the [Warehouse](/wms-api/warehouses/get-item) endpoint for more details.

line_items.description: List of line items included in the shipment.

receipts.description: List of receiving events associated with the inbound shipment.

inventory_item_id.description: Can be passed into the [Inventory](/wms-api/inventory/get-item) endpoint for more details.

expected_quantity.description: Total quantity of the item expected to be received.

received_quantity.description: Total quantity of the item that has been received.

inventory_item_id.description: Can be passed into the [Inventory](/wms-api/inventory/get-item) endpoint for more details.

quantity.description: Total quantity of the item that has been received.

id.description: The unique ID of the receiving event.

line_items.description: List of line items included in the receiving event.

id.description: The unique ID of the inbound shipment.

warehouse_customer_id.description: The ID of the merchant/tenant/customer that owns the inbound shipment. Can be passed into the [Warehouse Customer](/wms-api/warehouse-customers/get-item) endpoint for more details.

created_date.description: The date the inbound shipment was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

updated_date.description: The date the inbound shipment was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

purchase_order_number.description: The number of the purchase order associated with the inbound shipment.

status.description: The status of the inbound shipment. See the [inbound shipment information](info) for more details.

raw_status.description: The raw status (if available) returned directly from the WMS.

supplier.description: The supplier from which the shipment is being sent.

expected_arrival_date.description: Date the shipment is expected to reach the warehouse. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

warehouse_id.description: ID of the warehouse that will be receiving the shipment. Can be passed into the [Warehouse](/wms-api/warehouses/get-item) endpoint for more details.

line_items.description: List of line items included in the shipment.

receipts.description: List of receiving events associated with the inbound shipment.

id.description: The unique ID of the warehouse customer.

created_date.description: The date the warehouse customer was created. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

updated_date.description: The date the warehouse customer was last updated. (Format: `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ`)

name.description: The name of the warehouse customer.
